DOC.brief_summary: The trial design consecutive enrollment prospective one-center study . A minimum 30 patient include study . At implant installation , implant randomize one group ( Control : conventional loading , 8 week ; Test : early loading , 4 week ) . Samples peri-implant crevicular fluid ( PICF ) intrasulcular plaque collect -14 , 0 ( Baseline : prosthesis delivery ) , 7 day 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month .
